Facebook game developers use “Action Script and Flash” to make Facebook games. These two languages are very popular and most used game developing languages by Facebook game developers. Some of the Facebook game like “Sam’s Solitaire”, “FlipCup Challenge”, “Sheep Tycoon” is very popular from start till now.

From the time that first game was introduced on Facebook, the count never stopped. More and more businesses and individuals are turning to social gaming and developing games on Facebook to successfully make a name for them in the market. Many games have lunched but only some of them be successful.

Mobile Game Development – Convey innovative idea into Mobi

Mobile game developers emerge every day, the mobile gaming is innovations in field to improve rapidly. Modern mobile phones are small computers, with limited processing power by desktop standards, power enough to run a small game. This inherent ability to share information offers a unique opportunity to design games wherein players interact with other players, perhaps even on the other side of the world. Yet the world in infant stage in mobile gaming when compared to PC and console games.


Massive Multiplayer:

Global multiplayer is getting its value; the players can choose any opponent from any part of the world to play on his mobile device. Certainly in a few years massive multiplayer mobile games will hit the market like the PC game scenario.

Interactive Server:

Games run on a GPRS connection to connect with a central server. Many game manufacturing companies are taking up this gaming trend to make new online games for the avid users. For example,

New Products

Cost effective, update technology improve your game and something new concept earn revenue from each game. Many product based companies are now trying their hand on mobile games for advertising their product.

Custom iPhone 4S Games – Fun with the Latest iPhone

iPhone 4S has A5 central processing unit (CPU) more powerful than the iPhone 4?s A4 chip, and the iPhone 4S graphics run seven times faster. Important part of the game experience is the graphics on the screen. The iPhone 4S has the famous "retina" display found on the original iPhone 4. With a resolution of 640x 960, graphics are displayed with very fine levels of detail.

New features have been integrated in the phone including motion gaming, camera resolution and flash control along with language translators. The iPhone 4S has built in accelerometer sensors side to side. Most people will recognize this from when they turn the interface when on Facebook or sending a text. The interface will then rotate to fill the screen depending on whether it is tilted to landscape or portrait mode

iPhone 4S game development, choosing an outsourcing company that works with the latest technology to deliver good graphics and always assures quality at cost effective rates.

Amazing iPad Features that Raises a Gaming Experience

iPad has 1024X768 resolution screen means 9.7 inch diagonal and other things in favor of games in iPad are its super fast processor in form of A5 chips, this make iPad fast for gaming. Some added advantages are its multi-touch screen and accelerometer. Multi-touch screen provides an amazing experience of navigation and accelerometer allows you to flip the sides of rectangular iPad.

Game is the thing people like. Everyone wants to play games or want to engage with it. iPad is one device which facilitates a man's gaming hobby. It has some gaming features that support rich and engaging gaming environment.

Gaming features of iPad :

• The larger screen size and screen control real estate opens up a whole new range of game design possibilities.

• play game with rotating the iPad, this is possible due to its accelerometer

• Capacity to produce far better results when you say for graphics

• A4 chip provides good processing capacity for games

• Better processor means more horse power for game developers

• The battery lasts longer than expected

• It is a portable device so you can play games from anywhere

• Wide viewing angle for movies and video

Pioneer in Social Games Market with Facebook Game Developmen

Facebook is full of interesting things to do, one of which is playing games. The Facebook Developer Platform has created a whole new market for online games and start ups such as the Social Games Network.

Some of the key components to a social game designing are:

Niche Focus: Targeting a niche and being unique in that niche

Fun/Engagement: How engaging the core game play is to users

Incentives to Return: What incentives the game gives users to return

Social Interaction/Identity: What kind of *meaningful* ways people can interact with friends or other Face book users and how can players establish themselves as unique among these other players.

Advancement: A proper speed of advancement through the game

Monetization Incentives: How well the game incentive users to buy things to advance their game-play.

Content Refreshes: How well the developer is able to keep fresh content to keep users engaged

Top 5 Best Facebook Games :

1. Angry birds friends
2. Panda Jam
3. Stick run
4. Diamond dash
5. Song pop

Always Greeted Facebook Development With Smiles

The Facebook Games we develop fulfill the dual objectives of branding and entertainment by instantly catching user attention. Our Facebook Game Development team works out game concepts with clear and simple objectives, well-suited to your brand image. Various levels and challenges make the game shareable within different social circles, ensuring virality. Consequently, brand stories around the Facebook Game are generated, giving it more visibility.

Facebook Games are different from their console and desktop counterparts. It trades long sessions of game play for short, frequent interactions, and the game mechanics take advantage of new and existing social connections and weave them into the traditional goal and reward model that is at the heart of every game. This calls for radically different approach of development for Facebook games. You can't plug in any existing game in Facebook and call it one.

Why Facebook Gaming?

=> Fairly simple to build compared to AAA games like World of Warcraft and the like.
=> It’s not that hard to monetize through the sale of virtual goods and offers.
=> Gaining user-base is immensely helped via Facebook’s social stream.
=> Facebook is adding around a 100 million users every month (ever-growing potential user-pool).
=> These games cannot be pirated.
=> As a monetization platform, the iPhone undersells your applications whereas Facebook over-sells them.
=> Facebook trumps the iPhone in terms of potential user-base by hundreds of millions of more users!

What Technology Should I Use?
Facebook flash games developed on Adobe Flash CS5 and CS3, Adobe Air 2.5 script, shockwave, Action Script 2 and Action Script 3 are available at Facebook. We cover everything from initial game concepts and layouts through to the finished game, including artwork, animation, coding and sound design.

Facebook game developer team at GDI understands each and every aspect of facebook game development profoundly. They realize the important and crucial aspects that affect the users on this platform.

There are lots of Flash Facebook API’s; through you can easily make Facebook online games. However, many developers refer to go for PHP over Flash. With PHP, you can make an invisible 0x0 iframe on the canvas page with respect to load a PHP script to call all Facebook APIs effectively. This is extremely handy to make the database dynamic. This goes equally well with making any Facebook API call or sending notifications.

Experience more than reality with Flash Game Development

Nowadays, internet is not just for connecting friends through social network, sharing, emailing and surfing but it is more than that. One of them is gaming which is most likable thing for the every age people. Not only teenagers but the adults also like to make high score, make a new move, racing bikes, performing stunts etc. with more excitement and rush. With Flash, not only has gaming benefited but it has also changed the face of the World Wide Web.

A Flash game developer will need to have programming skills, graphical skills and work in a methodical manner with lots of patience. Experience Striking and Amazing Web Games with Flash Game De

Web games developmentrefers to those that are developed and played over form of computer network. Many Web games are based on flash. Flash game are very popular among Internet users in recent users, and come in a wide range of categories including educational games , sports, action, puzzle, adventure etc..

Flash Game Development Include:-

• Conceptualizing and developing online designs instantly
• Customize designs especially in context to an online apparel website in few clicks
• Educational Games and Puzzles
• Video and audio streaming
• Making online Flash-based Interactive presentations
• Online Advertising
• Immediate feedback from users

Flash Game Benefits:-

• Fast to load: - It’s one of the important benefits of Flash game development. Flash games load a lot faster than games developed with other software programs because it is 100% vector based.

• Animation Effect: - Flash also comes with many built-in animation effects, which makes it easier for developers to program a colorful, fast loading, smooth running gaming experience for players. Flash compiled animations use very little memory and bandwidth, without compromising on the quality and features of the games. The Flash developer kit from Adobe is also relatively inexpensive as professional game development software.

• Easy to develop: - With all this features flash is best way to develop web game easily.
